action.item: CREATE TABLE wisdm_TuningModel(TuningModelID INTEGER, ScenarioID INTEGER, Model TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (TuningModelID))
CREATE TABLE wisdm_brtTuning(brtTuningID INTEGER, ScenarioID INTEGER, Parameter1 TEXT, Parameter1Values TEXT, Parameter2 TEXT, Parameter2Values TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (brtTuningID))
CREATE TABLE wisdm_rfTuning(rfTuningID INTEGER, ScenarioID INTEGER, Parameter1 TEXT, Parameter1Values TEXT, Parameter2 TEXT, Parameter2Values TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (rfTuningID))

CREATE TABLE wisdm_OutputParameterTuning(OutputParameterTuningID INTEGER, ScenarioID INTEGER, ModelsID TEXT, ResponseCurves TEXT, ResidualsPlot TEXT, ResidualSmoothPlot TEXT, CalibrationPlot TEXT, ROCAUCPlot TEXT, AUCPRPlot TEXT, ConfusionMatrix TEXT, VariableImportancePlot TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (OutputParameterTuningID))
